overview: If you thought the other volumes of College Invasion were out of control, you haven't met the guys from this East Coast frat yet. They wanted to show every one up and have sex with the porn stars that came to party. Horny Serena and Cytherea were more than happy to show these guys how to bang it up. Ashley Blue, performer of the year, and Jamie were off giving hand jobs to the rest of the guys. Back in L.A. Becca Brat takes a newbie out on a date and student turned slut Angelina stops by for a romp. Better get the beer bong out for this one cause we came to party!!!
title: College Invasion 3
